meanings.definition: The act or process of invigorating.
meanings.sent1: Her invigorations of morning yoga always left her feeling refreshed.
meanings.sent2: The invigorations from the brisk walk in the park energized him for the day.
meanings.sent3: The invigorations of the dance class made her feel like she could conquer the world.
meanings.sent4: His invigorations of positive thinking were like a powerful elixir for his soul.
meanings.sent5: The invigorations of the cool breeze on her face were pure bliss.

meanings.sent1: After a good night's sleep, she woke up feeling invigorations throughout her body.
meanings.sent2: The invigorations of a hearty laugh could brighten even the gloomiest day.
meanings.sent3: The invigorations of winning the game filled him with a sense of accomplishment.
meanings.sent4: The invigorations of a new idea sparked creativity in the team.
meanings.sent5: The invigorations of a hot shower washed away all her tiredness.
